nodes.text: A tooka doll was a squeaky, stuffed doll, with one being owned by the Twi'lek girl Numa. It was modeled after the tooka species.
The doll was lost once by Numa in the shelter under their home after following a "bright-eye"; when her parents found it there, her father scolded her.

It was left in the deserted home and found by the clone troopers Waxer and Boil when they followed Numa back to her home during the Battle of Ryloth. Upon seeing the doll, she began crying, reminded of her lost family.
Pictured on the Halo was an image of a tattered tooka doll holding a knife, with Aurebesh text reading, "Nice Playin' With Ya".
